result.execSummary:
The defendant SCOTT D KOSBAB was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.

10:08 AM Defendant SCOTT D KOSBAB in court, in custody.  Attorney Peter F. Mannenbach in court for SCOTT D KOSBAB.  Attorney Laura Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. 
PLQ filed w/NC plea to Counts 1 & 4.  ADA Nelson - states offer on record - Option 1 of written offer.  Court reviews rights, charges & penalties w/DE.  DE enters NC pleas to Counts 1 & 4.  Court accepts waiver, plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Counts 1 & 4, DRI Counts 2 & 3.  Sentencing arguments. 
Court follows recommendation: 
Count 1: 60 days jail, $200 fine plus costs.
Count 2:  9 months jail, concurrent w/Count 1, $300 fine plus costs and $250 DNA surcharge & sample.  
Jail credit of 203 days w/good time.
Appeal , firearm & voting rights given to DE.
